mapper.insert: INSERT INTO favorite ( id, user_id, target_id, target_type, folder_id, status, create_time, update_time ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{userId}, #{targetId}, #{targetType}, #{folderId}, #{status}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime} ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE status = VALUES(status), folder_id = VALUES(folder_id), update_time = VALUES(update_time)
mapper.select: SELECT id, user_id AS userId, target_id AS targetId, target_type AS targetType, folder_id AS folderId, status, create_time AS createTime, update_time AS updateTime FROM favorite WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND target_id = #{targetId} AND target_type = #{targetType}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM favorite WHERE status = 1
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM favorite WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND status = 1
mapper.update: UPDATE favorite SET folder_id = #{newFolderId}, update_time = NOW() WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND folder_id = #{oldFolderId} AND status = 1
